review: didn't realize it had to be plugged in
author: jfmakins

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is great. Installs easily and just plain works!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it! great internet connect speed, super easy to set up!
author: Denise Whiteside

review: If  you think you are going wireless you are not.  The dongle still needs to be plugged into a wall outlet. You still are at the mercy of the speed of your internet provider.  At least it keeps dust out of one of your hdmi slots.
author: t'nman

review: Awesome product, easy to install and use.  Streaming quality is great, would recommend this to anyone with out hesitation. Way to go Amazon!
author: Wilkey

review: Turns any Ol' TV into a smart TV. Works just like it should. Pretty neat.
author: Cathy

review: I love our fire stick!  Bye bye cable!
author: s.wright "mom2angel"

review: The device(Fire TV Stick) tries hard to do it's job, and succeeds most of the time. It is a good streaming media player. My issue is with technical support, they do not seem to know much about the product. It's like it's not an Amazon product at all. The answers others, and I have received about trivial questions are very stupid, yes that is the best answer. For example, in one case Tech Support told the customer to contact an entirely different company for an issue having only to do with the Amazon Fire TV product. I was personally given an answer which was instantly proven wrong.
author: Jacob Martin

review: Not what I expected. Advertised it came with a free prime trial and it did not. Movie prices are expensive. Does not have any function unless you have a prime membership.
author: Elizabeth Michelli "Nurse Mom Wife"
